metadata.titleEn: Atmospheric circulation data set of sensitivity test simulation output under different geographical patterns of 60Ma and 25Ma
metadata.titleCn: 60Ma、25Ma不同地理格局下敏感性试验模拟输出的大气环流数据集
metadata.description:
Numerical experiments: The climate model used is the fast air sea coupling model (FAMOUS) jointly developed by the British Meteorological Office and British universities The horizontal resolution of the atmospheric model in the FAMOUS model is 5 ° × 7.5 °, 11 layers in vertical direction; The horizontal resolution of the ocean model is 2.5 ° × 3.75 °, 20 layers in vertical direction The atmosphere and ocean are coupled once a day without flux adjustment
The tests included the Middle Paleocene (MP,~60Ma BP, test name flat_60ma_1xCO2_sea_3d_ * * 100yr_mean. nc) and the Late Oligocene (LO,~25Ma BP, test name orog_25ma_1xCO2_sea_3d_ * * 100yr_mean. nc) The sea land distribution data is mainly taken from the global coastline basic data set (abbreviated as Gplates, website: http://www.gplates.org/ ）Considering that the initial uplift of Cenozoic terrains such as the Qinghai Tibet Plateau started at about 50~55 Ma (Searle et al., 1987), the global terrain height was set to 0 in the MP test to omit the role of plateau terrain. At 25 Ma, Greenland (Zachos et al., 2001) and the Qinghai Tibet Plateau (for example, Wang et al., 2014; Ding et al., 2014; Rowley and Currie, 2006; DeCells et al., 2007; Polisar et al., 2009) were revised The change of ancient latitude is also considered when reconstructing the ancient topography of the Qinghai Tibet Plateau (Besse et al., 1984; Chatterjee et al., 2013; Wei et al., 2013) At the same time, referring to the change of Cenozoic atmospheric CO2 (Beerling and Royer, 2011), the atmospheric CO2 concentration in the two periods of experiments was 280 ppmv (1 ppmv=1 mg L – 1) before the industrial revolution For simplicity, all land vegetation and soil properties are set to globally uniform values, that is, various land surface properties on each land grid point except Antarctica are assigned to the global average value of non glacial land surface before the industrial revolution, which is also convenient for highlighting the impact of land sea distribution and topographic changes In addition, since we mainly discuss the average climate state and its change in the characteristic geological period on the scale of millions of years, we can omit the influence of orbital forcing, that is, the Earth's orbital parameters are set to their modern values in all experiments
Output time: All tests were integrated for 1000 years, using the average results of the last 100 years of each test.
This data is helpful to explore the formation and evolution mechanism of the Cenozoic monsoon and drought.
metadata.descriptionCn:
数值试验：使用的气候模式是由英国气象局与英国大学联合开发的快速海-气耦合模式（FAMOUS）。FAMOUS模式中的大气模式水平分辨率为5°×7.5°，垂直方向有11层；海洋模式的水平分辨率为2.5°×3.75°，垂直方向有20层。大气和海洋每天耦合一次，无通量调整。
试验包括中古新世（MP, ~60Ma BP，试验名称flat_60ma_1xCO2_sea_3d_**100yr_mean.nc）和晚渐新世（LO, ~25Ma BP，试验名称orog_25ma_1xCO2_sea_3d_**100yr_mean.nc）。海陆分布数据主要取自全球海岸线基础数据集（缩写为Gplates，网址为http://www.gplates.org/），考虑到青藏高原等新生代地形的初始隆升约开始于50~55Ma（Searle等，1987），因而在MP试验中将全球地形高度均设置为0，以略去高原地形的作用。25Ma修正了格陵兰（Zachos等, 2001）、青藏高原（例如, Wang等，2014；Ding等，2014；Rowley和Currie, 2006；DeCelles等，2007；Polissar等，2009）。在重建青藏高原古地形时还考虑了其古纬度的变化(Besse等，1984；Chatterjee等，2013；Wei等，2013）。同时，参考新生代大气CO2变化（Beerling和Royer, 2011），2个时期的试验中大气CO2浓度均取工业革命前的值280ppmv（1ppmv=1mg L–1）。 为了简单起见，所有陆地植被和土壤特性都设置为全球均一的值，即在除南极洲外的每个陆地网格点上的各种陆面特性都被赋予工业革命前非冰川陆面的全球平均值，这样也便于突出检验海陆分布和地形变化的影响。此外，由于主要讨论百万年尺度特征地质时期的平均气候状态及其变化，因而可以略去轨道强迫的影响，即在所有试验中地球轨道参数均设置为其现代值。
输出时间：所有试验都被积分了1000年，使用了每个试验最后100年的平均结果。
本数据有助于探究新生代季风和干旱的形成演化机制。
metadata.instructions:
File name rules:
25Ma test name (e.g. orog_25ma_1xCO2_sea_3d)+variable name (e.g. ua)+time (100yr_mean)
60Ma test name (such as flat_60ma_1xCO2_sea_3d)+variable name (such as ua)+time (100yr_mean);
Data variable name: Omega (vertical velocity); ua（eastward_wind）；; va（northward_wind）； rh（relative_humidity）； qa（specific_humidity）etc
Usage: software that can read NC files, such as Panoply, NCEdit, etc.
Sea2d
Spatial resolution (x * y) 48 * 37, 7.5 * 5
Time resolution: 3 months
Vertical resolution is 1 layer
100 year average
Sea2d-evap-xipab-100yr-mean.nc
100 year average evaporation (kg/m2/s)
Sea2d-lh-xipab-100yr-mean.nc
100 year average surface heat flux (W/m2)
Sea2d-pme-xipab-100yr-mean.nc
100 year average total precipitation rate (kg/m2/s)
Sea2d-pr-xipab-100yr-mean.nc
100 year average precipitation rate (kg/m2/s)
Sea2d-psl-xipab-100yr-mean.nc
100 year mean sea level pressure
Sea2d-surlw-xipab-100yr-mean.nc
Downward surface radiation flux
Sea2d-sursw-xipab-100yr-mean.nc
Downward surface radiation flux
Sea2d-tas-xipab-100yr-mean.nc
1.5 m temperature
Sea2d-ts-xipab-100yr-mean.nc
surface temperature 
Sea3d
Spatial resolution (x * y) 96 * 73,3.75 * 2.5
Time resolution: 3 months
The vertical resolution is 20 layers
Sea3d-ta-xipab-100yr-mean.nc
Temperature (on the standard air pressure layer)
Spatial resolution (x * y) 48 * 37, 7.5 * 5
Time resolution: 3 months
The vertical resolution is 15 layers
Sea3d-qa -100yr-mean.nc
Specific humidity (on the standard air pressure layer)
Spatial resolution (x * y) 48 * 37, 7.5 * 5
Time resolution: 3 months
The vertical resolution is 15 layers
Sea3d-rh -100yr-mean.nc
Relative humidity (on the standard air pressure layer)
Spatial resolution (x * y) 48 * 37, 7.5 * 5
Time resolution: 3 months
The vertical resolution is 15 layers
Sea3d-ua-xipab-100yr-mean.nc
U Wind field (on the standard pressure layer)
Spatial resolution (x * y) 48 * 37, 7.5 * 5
Time resolution: 3 months
The vertical resolution is 15 layers
Sea3d-va-xipab-100yr-mean.nc
V Wind field (on the standard pressure layer)
Spatial resolution (x * y) 48 * 37, 7.5 * 5
Time resolution: 3 months
The vertical resolution is 15 layers
Sea3d-omega-100yr-mean.nc
Omega vertical wind field (on the standard atmospheric pressure layer)
Spatial resolution (x * y) 48 * 37, 7.5 * 5
Time resolution: 3 months
Vertical resolution is 1 layer
The precipitation in winter is 90 * 24 * 60 * 60=7776000
The precipitation in summer is 91 * 24 * 60 * 60=7,862,400
metadata.instructionsCn:
文件名称规则：
25Ma试验名（如：orog_25ma_1xCO2_sea_3d）+变量名（如ua） +时间（100yr_mean）
60Ma试验名（如：flat_60ma_1xCO2_sea_3d）+变量名（如ua） +时间（100yr_mean）;
数据变量名：Omega（vertical velocity）；ua（eastward_wind）；;va（northward_wind）；rh（relative_humidity）；qa（specific_humidity）etc
使用方法：可读取NC文件的软件，如Panoply、NCEdit等。

Sea2d
空间分辨率（x*y）48*37,7.5*5
时间分辨率3个月
垂直分辨率为1层
100年平均
Sea2d-evap-xipab-100yr-mean.nc
100年平均蒸发量（kg/m2/s）

100年平均表面热通量（W/m2）
Sea2d-pme-xipab-100yr-mean.nc
100年平均总的降水率（kg/m2/s）
Sea2d-pr-xipab-100yr-mean.nc
100年平均降水率（kg/m2/s）
Sea2d-psl-xipab-100yr-mean.nc
100年平均海平面气压
Sea2d-surlw-xipab-100yr-mean.nc
向下表面辐射通量
Sea2d-sursw-xipab-100yr-mean.nc
向下表面辐射通量
Sea2d-tas-xipab-100yr-mean.nc
1.5米的温度
Sea2d-ts-xipab-100yr-mean.nc
表面温度
Sea3d
空间分辨率（x*y）96*73,3.75*2.5
时间分辨率3个月
垂直分辨率为20层
Sea3d-ta-xipab-100yr-mean.nc
温度（在标准气压分层上）
空间分辨率（x*y）48*37,7.5*5
时间分辨率3个月
垂直分辨率为15层
Sea3d-qa -100yr-mean.nc
比湿（在标准气压分层上）
空间分辨率（x*y）48*37,7.5*5
时间分辨率3个月
垂直分辨率为15层
Sea3d-rh -100yr-mean.nc
相对湿度（在标准气压分层上）
空间分辨率（x*y）48*37,7.5*5
时间分辨率3个月
垂直分辨率为15层
Sea3d-ua-xipab-100yr-mean.nc
u风场（在标准气压分层上）
空间分辨率（x*y）48*37,7.5*5
时间分辨率3个月
垂直分辨率为15层

v风场（在标准气压分层上）
空间分辨率（x*y）48*37,7.5*5
时间分辨率3个月
垂直分辨率为15层

时间分辨率3个月

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the distinct features of atmospheric circulation data derived from sensitivity experiments under different geographic configurations over geological time scales?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 不同地理配置下的敏感性实验所得到的大气环流数据在地质时间尺度上的独特特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: horizontal resolution of 5°×7.5°, 11 vertical layers, horizontal resolution of 2.5°×3.75°, 20 vertical layers, Middle Paleocene (~60Ma BP), Late Oligocene (~25Ma BP), global elevation set to zero, modifications to landmasses, atmospheric CO2 concentration of 280 ppmv, land surface properties set to global averages, integration over 1000 years, average from the last 100 years, Earth's orbital parameters set to modern values
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 水平分辨率为5°×7.5°，11个垂直层；水平分辨率为2.5°×3.75°，20个垂直层；古新世中期（约6000万年前），晚渐新世（约2500万年前），全球海拔设为零，对陆地进行修改，大气中CO2浓度为280 ppmv，地表属性设为全球平均值，积分时间为1000年，最后100年的平均值，地球轨道参数设为现代值。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many layers are included in the vertical resolution of the atmospheric model used in a dataset related to atmospheric circulation simulations during different geological periods?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在与不同地质时期的大气环流模拟相关的数据集中，所使用的大气模型的垂直分辨率包含多少层？

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'FAMOUS climate model' mean in the context of atmospheric circulation data collection?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在大气环流数据收集的背景下，“FAMOUS气候模型”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: The 'FAMOUS climate model' refers to a fast ocean-atmosphere coupled model developed by the UK Met Office and UK universities. It is used for simulating atmospheric circulation data with a horizontal resolution of 5°×7.5° in the atmosphere and 2.5°×3.75° in the ocean, with 11 layers in the atmosphere and 20 layers in the ocean. It couples the atmosphere and ocean daily without flux adjustments.
Definition.AnswerCn: “著名气候模型”是由英国气象局和英国大学开发的一个快速海洋-大气耦合模型。它用于模拟大气环流数据，具有5°×7.5°的水平分辨率在大气中，和2.5°×3.75°的水平分辨率在海洋中，大气中有11层，海洋中有20层。该模型每天耦合大气和海洋，且没有通量调整。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors lead to the consideration of global uniformity in land surface characteristics when simulating atmospheric circulation for ancient geographic configurations?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在模拟古代地理配置的气候循环时，考虑土地表面特征的全球一致性的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The consideration of global uniformity in land surface characteristics is primarily to simplify the model and highlight the impact of changes in land-sea distribution and topography. By setting all land vegetation and soil properties to a global average value, the influence of these variables is minimized, allowing researchers to focus on the effects of geographic and topographic changes, such as the uplift of the Tibetan Plateau, on atmospheric circulation patterns during the specified periods of 60Ma and 25Ma.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 考虑全球土地表面特征的统一性，主要是为了简化模型并突出陆海分布和地形变化的影响。通过将所有陆地植被和土壤特性设置为全球平均值，最小化了这些变量的影响，使研究人员能够集中关注地理和地形变化的影响，例如在60百万年前和25百万年前的西藏高原抬升对大气环流模式的影响。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the implications of using a uniform value for land vegetation and soil characteristics on the analysis of the impact of land-sea distribution and topographic changes in climate modeling?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在气候模型中使用统一的土地植被和土壤特征值对土地-海洋分布和地形变化影响分析的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using a uniform value for land vegetation and soil characteristics simplifies the analysis by highlighting the effects of land-sea distribution and topographic changes, while ignoring regional variations in these properties. This approach allows for a clearer examination of the climatic impact of geographic and elevation changes over the million-year scale, but it might overlook localized climatic variations influenced by diverse vegetation and soil types.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用统一的土地植被和土壤特征值简化了分析，突出了陆海分布和地形变化的影响，同时忽略了这些属性的区域差异。这种方法允许更清晰地检查地理和海拔变化在百万年尺度上的气候影响，但可能忽视了受多样化植被和土壤类型影响的局部气候变化。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the primary goals of simulating atmospheric circulation using different geographical configurations from 60Ma and 25Ma, and how do these simulations contribute to understanding the evolution of Cenozoic monsoons and aridification?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 模拟不同地理配置下的气候环流（如60百万年前和25百万年前）主要目标是什么？这些模拟如何有助于理解新生代季风和干旱化的演变？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary goals are to explore the mechanisms behind the formation and evolution of Cenozoic monsoons and aridification by examining the impact of sea-land distribution and topography changes over geological time scales. By simulating atmospheric circulation under these different conditions, the research aims to understand how factors like the uplift of the Tibetan Plateau and changes in CO2 concentrations influenced climate patterns, thereby shedding light on the average climate state and its variability over millions of years.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是通过研究海陆分布和地形变化对气候的影响，探索新生代季风和干旱化形成与演化的机制。通过模拟在不同条件下的大气环流，研究旨在理解像青藏 Plateau的抬升和二氧化碳浓度变化等因素如何影响气候模式，从而揭示数百万年来平均气候状态及其变异性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What conditions and technologies enable the simulation and collection of atmospheric circulation data for different geological periods using climate models?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些条件和技术使得使用气候模型模拟和收集不同地质时期的大气环流数据成为可能？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The simulation and collection of atmospheric circulation data for different geological periods are enabled by the use of climate models, such as the FAMOUS model, developed by the UK Met Office and UK universities. This model utilizes a specific horizontal and vertical resolution for both atmospheric and oceanic components, with daily coupling and no flux adjustments. The conditions involve setting global topographic heights to zero for certain periods, adjusting for known geological changes, and using pre-industrial atmospheric CO2 concentrations. The integration of global coastline datasets and consideration of paleogeographic and paleoclimatic changes, such as tectonic uplift and CO2 variation, further enable accurate simulations.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 不同地质时期的大气环流数据的模拟和收集得益于气候模型的使用，例如由英国气象局和英国大学开发的FAMOUS模型。该模型对大气和海洋成分采用特定的水平和垂直分辨率，进行每日耦合且没有通量调整。条件包括将全球地形高度设置为零以适应某些时期，调整已知的地质变化，并使用前工业时期的大气CO2浓度。全球海岸线数据集的整合以及对古地理和古气候变化（如构造抬升和CO2变化）的考虑，进一步增强了模拟的准确性。
